title: Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Trees near Beach", 1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
dimensions:
9.1 x 14 cm (3 9/16 x 5 1/2 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.5 x 19 cm (4 15/16 x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Shoreline on left in foreground extending back. Trees along edgue of water. In distance, outcropping of land along horizon with possible structure along its top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Trees near Beach", 1902.
1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-44.
